Headline: #67 67th/69th/71st Temporary Reroute at 67th/Jeffrey
ShortDescription: 67 67th/69th/71st buses are rerouted in both directions via 67th, Jeffrey, Marquette Drive, South Shore Drive and 67th, due to police activity near 67th/Jeffrey

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#67 67th/69th/71st buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 67th, Jeffrey, Marquette Drive, South Shore Drive, then resume their normal route on 67th, due to police activity near 67th/Jeffrey.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Grand
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Grand due to a sick customer. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Grand due to a sick customer. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

These may include:

#56 Milwaukee

#8 Halsted

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
